member.name: ITfCleanupContextDurationSink.OnEndCleanupContext
member.summary: Called when a context cleanup operation completes.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITfCleanupContextDurationSink.OnStartCleanupContext
member.summary: Called when a context cleanup operation is about to begin.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITfCleanupContextDurationSink
member.summary: The ITfCleanupContextDurationSink interface is implemented by a text service to receive notifications when a context cleanup operation is performed. This notification sink is installed by calling with IID_ITfCleanupContextDurationSink.
